waifus.name: Thorns
waifus.text:
I started saving for him when he debuted on the CN server and then after six months of saving he just. Came home on the third ten roll. And I had a bunch leftover for Surtr. :')

Thorns is the only reason I've retained any sanity while playing Arknights. When I want to just burn through all my sanity and get on with my day, there he is. Good ol' reliable.

waifus.name: Phantom
waifus.text:
When I first saw his regular art I was like "oh he looks cool!" And then I saw his E2 art and was like :O

"I NEEEEEEEED HIM"

It does not matter if he is powercrept. He is still husbando.

waifus.name: Saria
waifus.text:
"yeah sure i'd be down to marry saria"

Like Thorns, good ol' reliable. I could not survive without Saria.

waifus.text: At first he was a dorky dude I could put in the waifu-adjacent favorites category, but then his theme Hit Different.

waifus.name: Penance
waifus.text: I say this in the most Asexual™ way possible: I'd let Penance step on me.

adjacent.name: Elysium
adjacent.text:
He's such a bro. I (platonically) love him so much.

He's a clown, but he's actually good at his job??? It's like crouching idiot, hidden badass, but the badass part is still a clown somehow and the shenanigans are great.

adjacent.name: Bagpipe
adjacent.text: At first I only pulled her for the meta, but she's been with me for so long and served me so well, she's grown on me a lot. Plus, she's so sweet ^w^
